item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:-52 Chances: The thriving digital banking trailblazer continues to post stellar financial results. Nvidia isn’t the only artificial intelligence stock to put on your radar. Traditional banking is transforming, and the banking collapse in 2023 has led to a shift in consumer preference.

item.title: FIS
item.description: score:299 Chances: Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (FIS) shareholders should be happy to see the share price up 17%. The latest trading day saw Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) settling at $62.96, representing a -1.08% change from its previous close. FIS and Banked have formed a partnership to create new pay-by-bank solutions by leveraging the power of open banking, APIs and real-time payments.

item.title: PAGS
item.description: score:231 Chances: PagSeguro (PAGS) has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past two months, and belongs to a strong industry as well.
